title: California homeopathic Dr. is first federally charged for selling fake COVID vaccine cards
author: ADAM FORGIE; Sinclair Broadcast Group
description: WASHINGTON (SBG) — A state-licensed homeopathic doctor from Napa, Calif. is the first person in the country federally charged for selling fake COVID-19 vaccination cards as well as immunization pellets she claimed would give buyers immunity from the virus for life, according to the U. S. Department of Justice.
